name: Poor Little Dog
description:
Help and adopt this poor little dog. With the objects on the stage help this poor dog to trust mankind again. But you have to be careful because of the 10 objects in the game, 5 will earn you this poor dog trust while the other 5 will make the dog dislike you and the game will be over.

After earning the dog's trust, play dress up with the dog. Slide the object you want to try on the dog. Double tap on the flower, necklace, ribbon, etc... to get different colors and styles.
- Unlock an extra costume by keeping the game for 5 days or more.
